channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

  • Description: On 10/04/2023 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL JFK service center, Bldg 263, JFK Int'I Airport, Jamaica, NY 11430 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1170, Ethanol solution, Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Bottle Material ofConstruction: Plastic Package Capacity: 226 g Amount in Package: 226 g Number in Shipment 2 Number Failed: 2

item.title: Report X-2023090800
item.description:
Report X-2023090800

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: YORKTOWN HGTS
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER DISCOVERED DAMAGED PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS NOT SPILLING OUT OF THE CARTON ALL LEAKAGE WAS CONFINDED TO THE BROKEN PAIL AND CARTON. RESPONDER TOOK PACKAGE FROM DISCOVERY LOCATION AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090772
item.description:
Report X-2023090772

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE ORANGE BELT, RESPONDED TO THE LEAKING PACKAGE WEARING APPROPRIATE PPE GEAR INCLUDING SILVER SHIELD GLOVE LINERS, IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE AS HAZMAT BASED ON FLAMABLE LIQIUID 3 DIAMOND LABLE AND IDENTIFIED THE CONTENTS AS ACETONITRILE, PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY LINED WITH GREEN DMP BAG CONTAINING ZEP ABSORBANT, AND TRANSPORTED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY TO DMP FOR PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2023090171
item.description:
Report X-2023090171

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: GARDEN CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was taken to a manager when at our Garden City, NY when an employee stated they heard what sound like metal cans inside of a FedEx pak. When the package was opened 2 spray cans of Dupli-Color High Performance Textured Metallic Coat. An sds of the commody shows the shipment is regulated for travel. There was no markings nor labels on the package to indicate dangerous goods were inside. Package has been held at station pending disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023100163
item.description:
Report X-2023100163

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: It was found with wet spots on the side of the box. It was put on a tugger and brought over to the hazmat cage and put on the fumes hud. DescribePack: The caps on all four jugs were loose, but two of them only spilled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was put on the fumes hud with the fan on.

item.title: Report X-2023100126
item.description:
Report X-2023100126

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-30T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100126 SequenceEvent: After preload sort on 09/20/2023, a Hazmat package on delivery vehicle was discovered to be damaged and leaking contents into truck. QA quickly contained leak by removing damaged package from vehicle and placing it in a red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and taking to QA cage on site DescribePack: Two plastic jugs of Hydrochloric acid damaged and leaking contents from loose/damaged caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damaged package placed in red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and staged in Hazmat cage on site for future processing by QA. Leaking Hydrochloric Acid inside delivery vehicle with absorbent. 2. X-2023100817 SequenceEvent: Package was discovered around 1030 am by a driver who alerted QA and hazmat trained personnel who immediately cleared the area and initiated clean up using a hazmat bin for transport of the package and material and neutralizer for cleanup and got the hazmat package to the hazmat cage in the appropriate bin. DescribePack: Package had poor handling insufficient packaging materials and inner packaging and dents to the inner containers. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The area was evacuated the material was contained and cleaned up rather quickly.

item.title: Report X-2023100105
item.description:
Report X-2023100105

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-30T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THIS PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON TRUCK#618 WET,WHEN I INSPECT THIS PACKAGE THE GLASS BOTTLE IS BROKEN DUE TO POSSIBLE MISHANDLING OF PACKAGE WHILE IN TRANSIT. DescribePack: WHEN I INSPECT THE DAMAGE GLASS IS BROKEN,DUE TO THE DRIVER MISHANDLING THE PACKAGE IN TRANSIT. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: WHILE IN TRANSIT THE DRIVER NEEDS TO BE MORE CAREFUL WITH THE HAZMAT TO MINIMIZING THE IMPACT OF DAMAGES.
